page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content: {Lanark}has a wide variety of Educational establishments. There are playgroup facilities in {Lanark}run by the State and private individuals. There are no other private {Schools} in {Lanark}and those wanting private { {Education }for their children send them either to Hamilton or to Glasgow.There are several state Primaries,Robert Owen ,Lanark Primary and New Lanark Primary.In addition there is St Mary's Roman Catholic Primary.Except for those wishing to send their children to the nearest Roman Catholic {School}in Motherwell ,the majority of parents send their children to {Lanark Grammar.}Many of the children from areas as far away as Douglas attend {Lanark Grammar} .However the situation has improved in recent years with the upgrading of Carluke High School.
